website_summaries.verdict: Gorgeous pointe shoes in satin that make the perfect pair when it's time to showcase your ballet talent in front of an audience.
pros: Pointe shoes that are constructed in leather and feature satin uppers, making them stand out when worn for stage performances
Ribbon ties complete the elegant look
They come with toe pads and a shoe bag
Available in classic pink, red, and black
cons: Sizes may run a bit small, and the shoes may fit some wearers snugly in the toes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pointe shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Super amazing! My daughter took these pictures in them and they are absolutely lovely! Amazing support!
customer_reviews.author: JEANINE  BELLMAN

customer_reviews.title: Steer clear from Nexete!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased these shoes, the description said "new." However, they were sent to me used with scuff marks and marring on the toes/sole, pathetic. Steer clear from Nexete!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: ... for both of my daughters and must say they loved them. The sizes seem to be on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for both of my daughters and must say they loved them. The sizes seem to be on the small side but the product itself was great. They are durable and exactly what the girls wanted
customer_reviews.author: yunuen sauza

customer_reviews.title: Very wide toe but pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very wide toe but the satin is pretty! I think I'll use them as decor in my room rather than to dance with as they are too big to feel supported well. If you are a male assigned at birth or really tall/big boned these would probably be perfect for you! <3
customer_reviews.author: P. R

customer_reviews.title: Average quality, overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The craftsmanship of the shoe is low to average. And of course it is made of China. I expcted a better product at a $30 price point. It works. But the material and quality is subpar.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Simply, a beautiful pair of pointe shoes, the best I have ordered through the internet, so far. Though my feet are quite long, they were a little to short and tight, but they look great.
customer_reviews.author: MagicalTala

customer_reviews.title: Red is so fun!
customer_reviews.text: I dance now mostly for fun and exercise. I bought the red shoes just for a change. They good quality however not something I could have used daily as I danced professionally. I do however recommend them and I am ordering another pair just because I find them fun.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Hopeful

customer_reviews.title: My Granddaughter loved them. She was so excited when she got ...
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loved them. She was so excited when she got them. Thanks :D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Red Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I tried them on, even stood en pointe with no problem, but I cant say I would ever use them for dancing. I bought them for display, but they are wearable. (I dont know that they would be as customizable as another brand for real daily dance). I bought them because...the Red Shoes.
customer_reviews.author: That Girl

customer_reviews.title: I am surprised at the material.
customer_reviews.text: These pointe shoes are not like the “name brand” I am used to. I am used to seeing my own ribbons on the right way. The quality is ok if they are just to practice in. I do not know if they will last long. Cheaply priced and cheaply made!
customer_reviews.author: P Farris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pointe shoes with very hard shank and too big
customer_reviews.text: The pointe shows look real nice. My daughter loves them. Their shanks are very hard in comparison to the ones she had before, but she doesn't mind. I ordered size 11, which according to the chart should be like European size 41, but they are more like a 42. So, a bit too big.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: They look nicer in the picture. When they arrived they were extremely small by at least two sizes and the quality of the soul was just not there. I ended up by returning this item and it took Two calls to Amazon for emails to the vendor to finally get a refund I definitely would not recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: InCREDible deal!
customer_reviews.text: These pointe shoes fit better than any I've ever purchased. I quickly bought them in red, too! The arch support is fantastic, and you truly cannot beat the price. Ribbons are already sewn on, rubber toe pads are included, and a drawstring bag. All you have to do is buy elastic. Two thumbs WAY up!
customer_reviews.author: G. Balint

customer_reviews.title: For prop use only
customer_reviews.text: These are not for actual use. Please don't put them on your children. On the plus side, they are beautiful, came quickly and arrived in a very nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: PhillyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter as a “Santa” gift. Should have looked at them earlier but they are way too small. I ordered 4s she wears a 4 but these are more like 2s.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: For my grandson who takes ballet and wanted to try point shoes. They fit perfectly using his tennis shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Great for home practice and pictures
customer_reviews.text: I'm a student, not a professional, and I enjoy these for at-home practice. They are stiff to start, but daily pointe practice helped me break them in. I am usually a size 7.5-8 but I ordered a 7 in these and I am happy with them. Now that they have broken in, I could argue that they're a tiny bit loose, so be conscious of that. The red satin look is very nice for pictures. All around, I'm not disappointed in these for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla D

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves Them!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good quality, price as a little high, but the quality made up for it. Daughter loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit my needs
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a “professional” ballerina so just keep that in mind. I was very happy with fit - size guide worked for me (US6), however I don’t use padding, so, they fit without padding - if you require extra items in your box you need to size up. Added bonus is that they photographed well.
customer_reviews.author: Mireya

customer_reviews.title: Cute ballet shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr old bought these for herself just for fun. She doesn’t take ballet, never has, so I don’t know how well they’d work for actual ballet class or practice. She loves them tho and says they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Kaireen

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter. They fit great and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Annette B.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. We’ve had them for about three weeks and my daughter only wore them on laminate flooring and carpet and already they are falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great product Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. I do not wear the cushions because I have more control with the shoes. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Dorburnell Smith

customer_reviews.title: Shoes on pointe
customer_reviews.text: These are great basic pointe shoes, they do run a little big, even with the toe pads so unless you need a little extra room for a bit of cotton on the toes I'd go a half size down. Hard shank, good sturdy toe box and the black satin is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Roze Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not functional
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter to practice with around the house and they are cute, but they run small and aren’t very functional. They started to fall apart after just a month. Not really worth the money if you have to keep buying one pair after another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed when these arrived in my mail. Its hard to find pointe shoes for adults where I live and I wasnt expecting much. They fit perfectly though and even come with toe pads, which was an unexpected bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Moliassa

customer_reviews.title: Sooo Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shoes! Not for professional work but, for doing exercises and practice work at home they’re great!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Champion

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Awesome slippers..my youngest daughter wants to be a ballerina and these were perfect slippers to start her with...she practices every night.
customer_reviews.author: Sariah

customer_reviews.title: They aren't strong shoes
customer_reviews.text: The issue with the shoes Is that the box was too thin. If you want to get them I recommend going at least two shoe sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Jones

customer_reviews.title: They Gap on the sides
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit her feet, however there is a huge gap on the sides. They don't look like what I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hamp.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes but...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were great just that they didn’t have that good of a fit.
customer_reviews.author: Anabel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love them i got them for my dance class and they love love them
customer_reviews.author: Joselyn Carreon

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a photo shoot and it worked out great !
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pointe shoes! They're so beautiful and a beautiful eye catcher! The only thing is when I try to where them with the gel insoles, they barely go on but otherwise perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Lewis

customer_reviews.title: do not use these
customer_reviews.text: Ok... so... these shoes ARE FOR DECORATION OR PHOTO SHOOTS ONLY... even then for photo shoots they aren't safe. Please don't use these. They are a serious risk for a broken ankle. Within the first time using them, the box shifted, and the box is plastic. They hurt too much. Please don't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Clef Fuhrman

customer_reviews.title: Not for little kids, and not for “fun dress up shoes “
customer_reviews.text: Only girls who are trained in ballet should use these. They are dangerous to put on if you don’t know what you are doing, and they are not meant to be worn by anyone under the age of 12 or 13, which is when the bones in the feet have grown sufficiently. When you take ballet, you don’t start pointe until that age, as they can really damage your feet. They are supposed to fit very snugly, and you typically need to size down several sizes for a proper fit. They are also very slippery when they are new. THESE ARE NOT TOYS OR DRESS UP SHOES!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Plz don’t
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t buy these for your kids lolll they could seriously hurt themselves :/
customer_reviews.author: ohyouknow

customer_reviews.title: Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful. However they were way too big. I ordered them for my 4 year old granddaughter. I measured her foot and selected her size based on the chart. They were big enough to fit me. I gave two stars because they are pretty but completely useless
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Davis

customer_reviews.title: They run WAY small
customer_reviews.text: Order at least a half size up. I wear a 37/ 37.5 and the size 37 pointe shoes do not fit at all. I can’t even get them onto my feet. I plan to order a 39. Other than that, they are beautifully made.
customer_reviews.author: Mme DLF

product_meta.title: Nexete Professional Vanassa Ballet Pointe Shoes Satin Dance Slipper Flats with Toe Pad for Girl Women
product_meta.description:
Nexete Professional Vanassa Ballet Dancing Pointe Shoes is perfect for normal practice, provide enough support for the the beginners and professional dancer. Nexete pointe Shoes Chart: Beginner order street size up 1 size , professional order same street size. 

EU 28 / 11 M Little kid Size 

EU 29/ 11.5 M Little kid Size 

EU 30 / 12 M Little kid Size 

EU 31 / 13 M Little kid Size 

EU 32 / 1 M Little kid Size 

EU 33 / 2 M Little kid Size 

EU 34 / 3 M Little Kid Size 

EU35 / 3.5 M Big Kid Size / 5 M Women 

EU 36 / 4 M Big Kid Size / 6 M Women 

EU 37 / 4.5 M Big Bid Size / 6.5 M Women 

EU 38 / 5 M Big Kid Size / 7 M Women Size 

EU 39 / 7.5-8 M Women Size 

EU 40 / 8.5 M Women Size 

EU 41 / 9 M Women Size 

EU 42 / 9.5 M Women Size 

EU 43 / 10 M Women Size 

EU 44 / 10.5-11 M Women Size

Package Included : 1 pair pointe shoes , 1 pair toe pads,1 pair ribbons ,1 pc drawstring shoes bag
feature_bullets: The pointe shoes is perfect for those who are still working on perfecting their pointe technique.
Satin upper, a wide toe box , Strong elastic shank, Leather Sole.
Suitable for square toes and great for use with toe pads.
Toe pads and ribbons are included.
